name: TAR - Total Arcade Racing
description:
Total Arcade Racing is a fun 2D top-down arcade racing game where you zip around closed circuits. This game is a tribute to the old classical top-down arcade racing games. 

Features
There isn't that much you can do so far in the game. You can drive around in a single circuit with a single car and get a time and position. 

Status
The game is currently in a very early stage of development. There are plans for local multiplayer up to 8 players and cars with different attributes. 

If you like the game and want to contribute with ideas, concept or just want to hang out please feel free to join our Discord Server.

The aim is to have weekly to bi-weekly updates published. 

Controls
Joypad is strongly recommended, use RT and LT to accelerate, left stick to steer. 

If you still want to use keyboard then use the WASD or arrow keys.
